name: UP04 BullsAndCows
description:
Welcome to Udemy Project "Bulls And Cows".
It's my first project from Old C++ Course with Unreal and fourth project in UP Series.
What you should know about this:

  1. Create prototype like Bulls And Cows from GameDev.tv course
  2. Use Unreal Engine 4 (4.27.2), BP & C++
  3. Learn about Maze generation
  4. Procedural assets and pipelines
  5. Hard Surface in Blender
  6. Sci-fi Concept Art
  7. FINISH THIS PROJECT
